gameStartTile.text: You awake after the first night of being trapped in Montressor's cellar. His masonry is sloppy though. Some of the mortar is soft and you might be able to break free.
gameStartTile.title: Awakening

clueOne.text: On the shelf in front of you is a ledger of sorts, filled with names. Scribed in the last spot is yours. At your feet are candles, still warm. Are others down here?
clueOne.title: A Ledger of Sorts

clueTwo.text: Before you is an alcove, at the back of which is a crypt set into the wall, containing one of Montressor's less fortunate guests. Away from which are a set of footsteps.
clueTwo.title: The Alcove

clueThree.text: Hanging before you is a set of keys! You recognize these as Montressor's garden keys used to access the outbuilding behind his house. Perhaps there is a stairway out of these wretched catacombs.
clueThree.title: The Keys

barrelEncounter.text: You find an oak barrel filled with one of Montressor's nicest amontillados. You take a large sip and feel revitalized, but know you can't live on wine forever. You must find your way out.
barrelEncounter.title: A Barrel of Wine

barrelTooSoon.text: You were just here at this barrel. You are a little too drunk to remember the path behind. Let's keep moving.

healthBottleOne.text: You come across a single bottle of wine in a nook in the cellar. You're not usually a fan of oloroso, but a sip can't hurt? This will give you some stamina to keep moving.
healthBottleOne.title: A Bottle of Wine

healthBottleTooSoon.text: You're a little sick of oloroso. You keep moving.

turnTwoInstructions.text: You've made it free from your prison ... for now. A small bit of light is coming from around one of these corners. Maybe there is a path out of here.
turnTwoInstructions.title: Time to Explore

gameWon.text: You finally reach a stairwell out of the cellar. The bright sun shines down into the entrance, leading you to freedom.
gameWon.title: Freedom

gameLost.text: Your body gives out from fatigue. You succumb to the catacombs to haunt future visitors.
gameLost.title: Death
